00022

00024     static const int _tmpERRORValue = ERROR;
00025 }
00026

00028     static const int ERROR = log4cpp::_tmpERRORValue;

00031 #else  // LOG4CPP_FIX_ERROR_COLLISION

00033        workaround. 
00034 #endif // LOG4CPP_FIX_ERROR_COLLISION
